00055 // Debug hooks
00056 
00057 #if defined(BOOST_SP_ENABLE_DEBUG_HOOKS)
00058 
00059 void sp_scalar_constructor_hook(void * px, std::size_t size, void * pn);
00060 void sp_array_constructor_hook(void * px);
00061 void sp_scalar_destructor_hook(void * px, std::size_t size, void * pn);
00062 void sp_array_destructor_hook(void * px);

00066 
00067 // The standard library that comes with Borland C++ 5.5.1
00068 // defines std::exception and its members as having C calling
00069 // convention (-pc). When the definition of bad_weak_ptr
00070 // is compiled with -ps, the compiler issues an error.
00071 // Hence, the temporary #pragma option -pc below. The version
00072 // check is deliberately conservative.
00073 
00074 #if defined(__BORLANDC__) && __BORLANDC__ == 0x551
00075 # pragma option push -pc
00076 #endif
00077 
00078 class bad_weak_ptr: public std::exception
00079 {
00080 public:
00081 
00082     virtual char const * what() const throw()
00083     {
00084         return "boost::bad_weak_ptr";
00085     }
00086 };
00087 
00088 #if defined(__BORLANDC__) && __BORLANDC__ == 0x551
00089 # pragma option pop
00090 #endif
00091 
00092 namespace detail{
00093 
00094 class sp_counted_base
00095 {
00096 //private:
00097 
00098     typedef boost::detail::lightweight_mutex mutex_type;
00099 
00100 public:
00101 
00102     sp_counted_base(): use_count_(1), weak_count_(1)
00103     {
00104     }
00105 
00106     virtual ~sp_counted_base() // nothrow
00107     {
00108     }
00109 
00110     // dispose() is called when use_count_ drops to zero, to release
00111     // the resources managed by *this.
00112 
00113     virtual void dispose() = 0; // nothrow
00114 
00115     // destruct() is called when weak_count_ drops to zero.
00116 
00117     virtual void destruct() // nothrow
00118     {
00119         delete this;
00120     }
00121 
00122     virtual void * get_deleter(std::type_info const & ti) = 0;
00123 
00124     void add_ref_copy()
00125     {
00126 #if defined(BOOST_HAS_THREADS)
00127         mutex_type::scoped_lock lock(mtx_);
00128 #endif
00129         ++use_count_;
00130     }
00131 
00132     void add_ref_lock()
00133     {
00134 #if defined(BOOST_HAS_THREADS)
00135         mutex_type::scoped_lock lock(mtx_);
00136 #endif
00137         if(use_count_ == 0) boost::serialization::throw_exception(bad_weak_ptr());
00138         ++use_count_;
00139     }
00140 
00141     void release() // nothrow
00142     {
00143         {
00144 #if defined(BOOST_HAS_THREADS)
00145             mutex_type::scoped_lock lock(mtx_);
00146 #endif
00147             long new_use_count = --use_count_;
00148 
00149             if(new_use_count != 0) return;
00150         }
00151 
00152         dispose();
00153         weak_release();
00154     }
00155 
00156     void weak_add_ref() // nothrow
00157     {
00158 #if defined(BOOST_HAS_THREADS)
00159         mutex_type::scoped_lock lock(mtx_);
00160 #endif
00161         ++weak_count_;
00162     }
00163 
00164     void weak_release() // nothrow
00165     {
00166         long new_weak_count;
00167 
00168         {
00169 #if defined(BOOST_HAS_THREADS)
00170             mutex_type::scoped_lock lock(mtx_);
00171 #endif
00172             new_weak_count = --weak_count_;
00173         }
00174 
00175         if(new_weak_count == 0)
00176         {
00177             destruct();
00178         }
00179     }
00180 
00181     long use_count() const // nothrow
00182     {
00183 #if defined(BOOST_HAS_THREADS)
00184         mutex_type::scoped_lock lock(mtx_);
00185 #endif
00186         return use_count_;
00187     }
00188 
00189 //private:
00190 public:
00191     sp_counted_base(sp_counted_base const &);
00192     sp_counted_base & operator= (sp_counted_base const &);
00193 
00194     long use_count_;        // #shared
00195     long weak_count_;       // #weak + (#shared != 0)
00196 
00197 #if defined(BOOST_HAS_THREADS) || defined(BOOST_LWM_WIN32)
00198     mutable mutex_type mtx_;
00199 #endif
00200 };
00201 
00202 #if defined(BOOST_SP_ENABLE_DEBUG_HOOKS)
00203 
00204 template<class T> void cbi_call_constructor_hook(sp_counted_base * pn, T * px, checked_deleter<T> const &, int)
00205 {
00206     boost::sp_scalar_constructor_hook(px, sizeof(T), pn);
00207 }
00208 
00209 template<class T> void cbi_call_constructor_hook(sp_counted_base *, T * px, checked_array_deleter<T> const &, int)
00210 {
00211     boost::sp_array_constructor_hook(px);
00212 }
00213 
00214 template<class P, class D> void cbi_call_constructor_hook(sp_counted_base *, P const &, D const &, long)
00215 {
00216 }
00217 
00218 template<class T> void cbi_call_destructor_hook(sp_counted_base * pn, T * px, checked_deleter<T> const &, int)
00219 {
00220     boost::sp_scalar_destructor_hook(px, sizeof(T), pn);
00221 }
00222 
00223 template<class T> void cbi_call_destructor_hook(sp_counted_base *, T * px, checked_array_deleter<T> const &, int)
00224 {
00225     boost::sp_array_destructor_hook(px);
00226 }
00227 
00228 template<class P, class D> void cbi_call_destructor_hook(sp_counted_base *, P const &, D const &, long)
00229 {
00230 }
00231 
00232 #endif
00233 
00234 //
00235 // Borland's Codeguard trips up over the -Vx- option here:
00236 //
00237 #ifdef __CODEGUARD__
00238 # pragma option push -Vx-
00239 #endif
00240 
00241 template<class P, class D> class sp_counted_base_impl: public sp_counted_base
00242 {
00243 //private:
00244 public:
00245     P ptr; // copy constructor must not throw
00246     D del; // copy constructor must not throw
00247 
00248     sp_counted_base_impl(sp_counted_base_impl const &);
00249     sp_counted_base_impl & operator= (sp_counted_base_impl const &);
00250 
00251     typedef sp_counted_base_impl<P, D> this_type;
00252 
00253 public:
00254 
00255     // pre: initial_use_count <= initial_weak_count, d(p) must not throw
00256 
00257     sp_counted_base_impl(P p, D d): ptr(p), del(d)
00258     {
00259 #if defined(BOOST_SP_ENABLE_DEBUG_HOOKS)
00260         detail::cbi_call_constructor_hook(this, p, d, 0);
00261 #endif
00262     }
00263 
00264     virtual void dispose() // nothrow
00265     {
00266 #if defined(BOOST_SP_ENABLE_DEBUG_HOOKS)
00267         detail::cbi_call_destructor_hook(this, ptr, del, 0);
00268 #endif
00269         del(ptr);
00270     }
00271 
00272     virtual void * get_deleter(std::type_info const & ti)
00273     {
00274         return ti == typeid(D)? &del: 0;
00275     }
00276 
00277 #if defined(BOOST_SP_USE_STD_ALLOCATOR)
00278 
00279     void * operator new(std::size_t)
00280     {
00281         return std::allocator<this_type>().allocate(1, static_cast<this_type *>(0));
00282     }
00283 
00284     void operator delete(void * p)
00285     {
00286         std::allocator<this_type>().deallocate(static_cast<this_type *>(p), 1);
00287     }
00288 
00289 #endif
00290 
00291 #if defined(BOOST_SP_USE_QUICK_ALLOCATOR)
00292 
00293     void * operator new(std::size_t)
00294     {
00295         return boost::detail::quick_allocator<this_type>::alloc();
00296     }
00297 
00298     void operator delete(void * p)
00299     {
00300         boost::detail::quick_allocator<this_type>::dealloc(p);
00301     }
00302 
00303 #endif
00304 };
00305 
00306 #if defined(BOOST_SP_ENABLE_DEBUG_HOOKS)
00307 
00308 int const shared_count_id = 0x2C35F101;
00309 int const   weak_count_id = 0x298C38A4;
00310 
00311 #endif
00312 
00313 class weak_count;
00314 
00315 class shared_count
00316 {
00317 //private:
00318 public:
00319     sp_counted_base * pi_;
00320 
00321 #if defined(BOOST_SP_ENABLE_DEBUG_HOOKS)
00322     int id_;
00323 #endif
00324 
00325     friend class weak_count;
00326 
00327 public:
00328 
00329     shared_count(): pi_(0) // nothrow
00330 #if defined(BOOST_SP_ENABLE_DEBUG_HOOKS)
00331         , id_(shared_count_id)
00332 #endif
00333     {
00334     }
00335 
00336     template<class P, class D> shared_count(P p, D d): pi_(0)
00337 #if defined(BOOST_SP_ENABLE_DEBUG_HOOKS)
00338         , id_(shared_count_id)
00339 #endif
00340     {
00341 #ifndef BOOST_NO_EXCEPTIONS
00342 
00343         try
00344         {
00345             pi_ = new sp_counted_base_impl<P, D>(p, d);
00346         }
00347         catch(...)
00348         {
00349             d(p); // delete p
00350             throw;
00351         }
00352 
00353 #else
00354 
00355         pi_ = new sp_counted_base_impl<P, D>(p, d);
00356 
00357         if(pi_ == 0)
00358         {
00359             d(p); // delete p
00360             boost::serialization::throw_exception(std::bad_alloc());
00361         }
00362 
00363 #endif
00364     }
00365 
00366 #ifndef BOOST_NO_AUTO_PTR
00367 
00368     // auto_ptr<Y> is special cased to provide the strong guarantee
00369 
00370     template<class Y>
00371     explicit shared_count(std::auto_ptr<Y> & r): pi_(
00372         new sp_counted_base_impl<
00373             Y *, 
00374             boost::checked_deleter<Y>
00375         >(r.get(), boost::checked_deleter<Y>()))
00376 #if defined(BOOST_SP_ENABLE_DEBUG_HOOKS)
00377         , id_(shared_count_id)
00378 #endif
00379     {
00380         r.release();
00381     }
00382 
00383 #endif 
00384 
00385     ~shared_count() // nothrow
00386     {
00387         if(pi_ != 0) pi_->release();
00388 #if defined(BOOST_SP_ENABLE_DEBUG_HOOKS)
00389         id_ = 0;
00390 #endif
00391     }
00392 
00393     shared_count(shared_count const & r): pi_(r.pi_) // nothrow
00394 #if defined(BOOST_SP_ENABLE_DEBUG_HOOKS)
00395         , id_(shared_count_id)
00396 #endif
00397     {
00398         if(pi_ != 0) pi_->add_ref_copy();
00399     }
00400 
00401     explicit shared_count(weak_count const & r); // throws bad_weak_ptr when r.use_count() == 0
00402 
00403     shared_count & operator= (shared_count const & r) // nothrow
00404     {
00405         sp_counted_base * tmp = r.pi_;
00406 
00407         if(tmp != pi_)
00408         {
00409             if(tmp != 0) tmp->add_ref_copy();
00410             if(pi_ != 0) pi_->release();
00411             pi_ = tmp;
00412         }
00413 
00414         return *this;
00415     }
00416 
00417     void swap(shared_count & r) // nothrow
00418     {
00419         sp_counted_base * tmp = r.pi_;
00420         r.pi_ = pi_;
00421         pi_ = tmp;
00422     }
00423 
00424     long use_count() const // nothrow
00425     {
00426         return pi_ != 0? pi_->use_count(): 0;
00427     }
00428 
00429     bool unique() const // nothrow
00430     {
00431         return use_count() == 1;
00432     }
00433 
00434     friend inline bool operator==(shared_count const & a, shared_count const & b)
00435     {
00436         return a.pi_ == b.pi_;
00437     }
00438 
00439     friend inline bool operator<(shared_count const & a, shared_count const & b)
00440     {
00441         return std::less<sp_counted_base *>()(a.pi_, b.pi_);
00442     }
00443 
00444     void * get_deleter(std::type_info const & ti) const
00445     {
00446         return pi_? pi_->get_deleter(ti): 0;
00447     }
00448 };
00449 
00450 #ifdef __CODEGUARD__
00451 # pragma option pop
00452 #endif
00453 
00454 
00455 class weak_count
00456 {
00457 private:
00458 
00459     sp_counted_base * pi_;
00460 
00461 #if defined(BOOST_SP_ENABLE_DEBUG_HOOKS)
00462     int id_;
00463 #endif
00464 
00465     friend class shared_count;
00466 
00467 public:
00468 
00469     weak_count(): pi_(0) // nothrow
00470 #if defined(BOOST_SP_ENABLE_DEBUG_HOOKS)
00471         , id_(weak_count_id)
00472 #endif
00473     {
00474     }
00475 
00476     weak_count(shared_count const & r): pi_(r.pi_) // nothrow
00477 #if defined(BOOST_SP_ENABLE_DEBUG_HOOKS)
00478         , id_(shared_count_id)
00479 #endif
00480     {
00481         if(pi_ != 0) pi_->weak_add_ref();
00482     }
00483 
00484     weak_count(weak_count const & r): pi_(r.pi_) // nothrow
00485 #if defined(BOOST_SP_ENABLE_DEBUG_HOOKS)
00486         , id_(shared_count_id)
00487 #endif
00488     {
00489         if(pi_ != 0) pi_->weak_add_ref();
00490     }
00491 
00492     ~weak_count() // nothrow
00493     {
00494         if(pi_ != 0) pi_->weak_release();
00495 #if defined(BOOST_SP_ENABLE_DEBUG_HOOKS)
00496         id_ = 0;
00497 #endif
00498     }
00499 
00500     weak_count & operator= (shared_count const & r) // nothrow
00501     {
00502         sp_counted_base * tmp = r.pi_;
00503         if(tmp != 0) tmp->weak_add_ref();
00504         if(pi_ != 0) pi_->weak_release();
00505         pi_ = tmp;
00506 
00507         return *this;
00508     }
00509 
00510     weak_count & operator= (weak_count const & r) // nothrow
00511     {
00512         sp_counted_base * tmp = r.pi_;
00513         if(tmp != 0) tmp->weak_add_ref();
00514         if(pi_ != 0) pi_->weak_release();
00515         pi_ = tmp;
00516 
00517         return *this;
00518     }
00519 
00520     void swap(weak_count & r) // nothrow
00521     {
00522         sp_counted_base * tmp = r.pi_;
00523         r.pi_ = pi_;
00524         pi_ = tmp;
00525     }
00526 
00527     long use_count() const // nothrow
00528     {
00529         return pi_ != 0? pi_->use_count(): 0;
00530     }
00531 
00532     friend inline bool operator==(weak_count const & a, weak_count const & b)
00533     {
00534         return a.pi_ == b.pi_;
00535     }
00536 
00537     friend inline bool operator<(weak_count const & a, weak_count const & b)
00538     {
00539         return std::less<sp_counted_base *>()(a.pi_, b.pi_);
00540     }
00541 };
00542 
00543 inline shared_count::shared_count(weak_count const & r): pi_(r.pi_)
00544 #if defined(BOOST_SP_ENABLE_DEBUG_HOOKS)
00545         , id_(shared_count_id)
00546 #endif
00547 {
00548     if(pi_ != 0)
00549     {
00550         pi_->add_ref_lock();
00551     }
00552     else
00553     {
00554         boost::serialization::throw_exception(bad_weak_ptr());
00555     }
00556 }
00557 
00558 } // namespace detail
